metadata.description:
# Events

The near discovery events app.
Create and Participate on events. 

This is an experiment to see if the current state of near-social allows for apps to be built on top of the social-db contract.
See the github README.md for details on how this app was built and how to build your own. 
# WORK IN PROGRESS

=== Work in Progress ===
repository: https://github.com/NEARFoundation/events-platform
issues: https://github.com/NEARFoundation/events-platform/issues

Functionality:
CRUD Events
CRUD EventLists
Search Events
Participate
